name: Josefin
subject: Request
message:
Dear The Palace Madrid,
can you please price the following stay:
1 room for 1 adult from 14th April to 15th April 2026.

Looking forward to your offer!

Best regards

formDataGroup.faqQuestionOnlyIntro: We're happy to answer your question. Please find our answer below:
formDataGroup.offerIntroText: We are pleased to send you our offer
formDataGroup.textEditorFormatted:
Dear Josefin,


Greetings from The Palace Hotel, Madrid, a living legend since 1912. Thank you for considering our hotel for your upcoming stay.

Cancel.label: DEFAULT
Cancel.cancelpolicy:
You may cancel your reservation for no charge before 11:59 PM local hotel time 1 day before arrival date.
Please note that we will assess a fee of the first night rate if you must cancel after this deadline.
If you have made a prepayment, we will retain all or part of your prepayment. If not, we will charge your credit card.
Cancel.paymentpolicy: Credit card is required at time of booking to guarantee the reservation, this credit card will be used in case of no show or cancellation.

Cancel.label: 24 hours
Cancel.cancelpolicy:
Cancellations made up to 24 hours prior to the scheduled arrival incur no penalty.
Cancellations made less than 24 hours before arrival, or in case of no-show, will incur a charge equivalent to 100% of the first night’s stay.
Cancel.paymentpolicy:
We would like to kindly inform you that no reservation has been made at this stage. However, this proposal remains guaranteed for the next 24 hours. Following this period, we would be pleased to revisit our offer, subject to availability and prevailing rates.
Should you wish to proceed with the reservation, please inform us at your earliest convenience. A secure credit card guarantee form will then be provided via our electronic platform.
We look forward to your confirmation and remain at your complete disposal for any further assistance you may require.

Cancel.label: Book in Advance and Save
Cancel.headline: Book in Advance and Save
Cancel.cancelpolicy: In the event of cancellation, the full prepayment will be forfeited.
Cancel.paymentpolicy:
A valid credit card is required at the time of reservation to guarantee this prepaid, non-refundable rate. The total amount of the stay will be charged within twenty-four (24) hours of booking confirmation.
Should payment not be successfully processed within forty-eight (48) hours of the reservation being made, the hotel reserves the right to cancel the booking at its sole discretion.
Reservation date modifications may be requested up to seven (7) days prior to arrival, until 11:59 p.m. local hotel time. Any approved modification may result in a corresponding adjustment to the total value of the reservation.
If a modification results in a lower applicable rate, the difference from the original prepayment will be respectfully forfeited. Should the revised dates carry a higher rate, the additional amount will be charged as a supplemental prepayment.
Date changes are not permitted within seven (7) days of arrival.
The credit card provided at the time of reservation must remain valid for the entirety of the guest’s stay.

Mealplans.label: Flexible Rate
Mealplans.headline: Flexible Rate
Mealplans.description: Best available rate with full flexibility and no restrictions.

Mealplans.label: Book in Advance and Save inclusive of Breakfast
Mealplans.headline: Book in Advance and Save inclusive of Breakfast
Mealplans.description: Plan ahead and secure an exclusive saving for your stay, with breakfast in the hotel restaurant for up to two adults and children aged 11 and under, registered in the same room. For additional guests aged 12 and older, the full breakfast rate at the hotel restaurant applies. This non-refundable rate requires full payment within 24 hours of booking. Date changes are allowed up to 7 days prior to arrival (11:59 PM local hotel time) and may adjust the total cost. Reductions in total will forfeit the difference from the original prepayment, while increases will require an additional prepayment. Cancellations will result in forfeiture of the full prepayment.

Mealplans.label: Stay Longer on Us - 3 Nights
Mealplans.headline: Stay Longer on Us - 3 Nights
Mealplans.description: Stay 3 nights or more and enjoy 10% savings on our flexible guest room rate, also known as the standard rate. Discounts are already included in the rate at the time of booking, with no further reductions applicable. A minimum stay of 3 nights is required, and any changes to the length of stay, including early departures, may result in an adjustment to the rate.

RoomTypes.label: PALACE TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PALACE TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
33 m2 / 355 ft2 (average size)
Experience elegance in our Palace Room, where the spacious design ensures comfort. 
Accommodating up to three guests, two twin beds, with the option to add an extra bed. An accessible option is also available. 
Overlooking the courtyard or surrounding streets, the room offers a full bathroom with a bathtub, handheld shower, and rain shower.

RoomTypes.label: DELUXE TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: DELUXE TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
31 m2 / 334 ft2 (average size)

This room offers a bright and quiet ambiance, ensuring a peaceful stay. It features two twin beds, along with an elegant walk-in shower.

With views of the courtyard and the hotel's stunning glass ceiling, it creates a cozy and relaxing atmosphere.

Some Deluxe rooms include a bathtub, available upon request and subject to availability.

RoomTypes.label: PREMIUM KING ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PREMIUM KING ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
33 m2 / 355 ft2 (average size)
Overlooking a side street in Madrid, these rooms accommodate up to three guests, with either a king-size bed or two twin beds, along with the option to add an extra bed. 
The bathrooms are equipped with a shower, and some rooms also feature a bathtub, with options for a handheld shower or a rain shower.

RoomTypes.label: PREMIUM TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PREMIUM TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
33 m2 / 355 ft2 (average size)
Overlooking a side street in Madrid, these rooms accommodate up to three guests, two twin beds, along with the option to add an extra bed. 
The bathrooms are equipped with a shower, and some rooms also feature a bathtub, with options for a handheld shower or a rain shower.

RoomTypes.label: PREMIUM CORTES ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PREMIUM CORTES ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
35 m2 / 377 ft2 (average size)
This sophisticated room is perfect for guests who value extra space and stunning views. 
Featuring a king-size bed, it accommodates up to three guests. 
The highlight is the breathtaking view of the Palacio de las Cortes. 
Also includes a bathroom with both a hand-shower and rain-shower for a refined stay.

RoomTypes.label: PREMIUM NEPTUNO KING ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PREMIUM NEPTUNO KING ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
37 m2 / 398 ft2 (average size)
This bright and spacious room offers stunning panoramic views of the majestic Fountain of Neptune, built in 1780 and located at the beginning of the Paseo del Prado. 
Accommodating up to three guests, it features either a king-size bed or two twin beds, with the option to add an extra bed. 
The full bathroom includes a bathtub, handheld shower, and rain shower.

RoomTypes.label: PREMIUM NEPTUNO TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: PREMIUM NEPTUNO TWIN ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
37 m2 / 398 ft2 (average size)
This bright and spacious room offers stunning panoramic views of the majestic Fountain of Neptune, built in 1780 and located at the beginning of the Paseo del Prado. 
Accommodating up to three guests, it features either  two twin beds, with the option to add an extra bed. 
The full bathroom includes a bathtub, handheld shower, and rain shower.

RoomTypes.label: GRAND PREMIUM NEPTUNO ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: GRAND PREMIUM NEPTUNO ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
38 m2 / 409 ft2 (average size)
This room offers breathtaking views of the iconic Fountain of Neptune, built in 1780, from its elegant bay window overlooking the beginning of Paseo del Prado. 
This spacious room features a luxurious king-size bed and provides a refined setting for relaxation and comfort. It includes a deluxe bathtub, a separate walk-in shower, and can accommodate up to three guests.

RoomTypes.label: PALACE SUITE
RoomTypes.headline: PALACE SUITE
RoomTypes.description:
57 m2 / 613 ft2 (average size)
For guests seeking elegance and privacy, this one-bedroom suite features two separate areas, ensuring both comfort and discretion. 
With views of the serene Dome Courtyard or a surrounding Madrid street, it offers a tranquil yet sophisticated atmosphere, ideal for an extended stay or a luxury getaway.

RoomTypes.label: CERVANTES SUITE
RoomTypes.headline: CERVANTES SUITE
RoomTypes.description:
68 m2 / 732 ft2 (average size)
Exclusive one-bedroom suite, ideal for those seeking space and comfort. It features two separate areas, a king-size bed, and a luxurious bathroom. 
With views of the urban landscape, this suite offers a premium experience in the heart of the city

RoomTypes.label: CORTES SUITE
RoomTypes.headline: CORTES SUITE
RoomTypes.description:
72 m2 / 775 ft2 (average size)
Immerse yourself in luxury and sophistication with our Cortes Suite, an exclusive retreat that redefines elegance. 
It features two separate areas, a king-size bed, a dining table in the living room, and large windows offering unmatched views of the majestic Palacio de las Cortes, home to the Spanish Parliament.

RoomTypes.label: NEPTUNO SUITE
RoomTypes.headline: NEPTUNO SUITE
RoomTypes.description:
95 m2 / 1,023 ft2 (average size)
This luxurious top-tier suite features two separate spaces, a king-size bed, and panoramic views of the iconic Fountain of Neptune, built in 1780 at the heart of Paseo del Prado. 
esigned for those seeking maximum comfort, it also offers exclusive details that add a touch of elegance to your experience.

RoomTypes.label: ROYAL SUITE
RoomTypes.headline: ROYAL SUITE
RoomTypes.description:
168 m²/ 1,808.40 ft2 (average size)
This is luxurious top-tier accommodation, featuring two separate spaces, a king-size bed, and panoramic views of Neptuno. 
Designed for guests seeking the ultimate in comfort and breathtaking scenery, this suite is the perfect choice for a refined and unforgettable stay

RoomTypes.label: DELUXE KING ROOM
RoomTypes.headline: DELUXE KING ROOM
RoomTypes.description:
31 m2 / 334 ft2 (average size)
This room offers a bright and quiet ambiance, ensuring a peaceful stay. It features a king-size bed, along with an elegant walk-in shower.

Deluxe rooms include a bathtub, available upon request and subject to availability.

Overlooking the courtyard or surrounding streets, the room offers a full bathroom with a bathtub, handheld shower, and rain shower.

We would like to kindly inform you that no reservation has been made at this stage. However, this proposal remains guaranteed for the next 24 hours. Following this period, we would be pleased to revisit our offer, subject to availability and prevailing rates.

Should you wish to proceed with the reservation, please inform us at your earliest convenience. A secure credit card guarantee form will then be provided via our electronic platform.

We look forward to your confirmation and remain at your complete disposal for any further assistance you may require.

Cancellations made less than 24 hours before arrival, or in case of no-show, will incur a charge equivalent to 100% of the first night’s stay.

context.email_body:
Dear The Palace Madrid,
can you please price the following stay:
1 room for 1 adult from 14th April to 15th April 2026.

Looking forward to your offer!

Best regards
context.subject: Request

RestP1_A: The Palace, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Madrid has spent over a century at the heart Madrid’s gourmet scene. Open throughout the day, La Cúpula restaurant, renowned for its imposing stained-glass dome, is a natural draw for those looking to drink, dine and gather, whilst 27 Club, nearby, provides a time-honored setting where expertly mixed cocktails continue to delight guests.
HotelP1_A: Facing the majestic Neptuno Fountain, The Palace, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Madrid is ideally placed within the UNESCO accredited Landscape of Light district. Both witness and actor, this Madrid hotel in the city center is embedded in the cultural fabric of the capital and is in easy walking distance of its most impressive cultural institutions that form the prestigious Golden Triangle of Art. Honoring heritage and modern living, 470 handsomely elegant guestrooms, suites and connected rooms, perfect for families, in Madrid, reflect the fascinating history of a bygone century.
SpecialHeadline_A: How should I know if this email is legit?
SpecialP1_A: Rest assured that this email originates from a verified and secure source. You can confirm its authenticity by examining the email headers. The "From," "Signed by," "Answer to," and "Sent by" fields all clearly indicate our official domain: [specify domain]. This consistent domain information is a key indicator that the email is genuinely from [Your Hotel Name] and hasn't been tampered with.
SpecialP2_A: Furthermore, the transmission of this email is protected by Transport Layer Security (TLS), a standard encryption protocol. This means that the information exchanged between our mail server and yours is encrypted, safeguarding your data from potential interception. You may see an indicator in your email client (such as a padlock icon) confirming this secure connection.
SpecialP3_A: Finally, any links within this email will direct you to our trusted domain, [specify domain]. This ensures that you are always interacting with our official website and can have confidence in the security of any information you provide there. We prioritize your security and take these measures to protect your communication and data.
Booking_BodyTextAddin: Thank you for considering XXX for your visit to XXX.
OfferIntro: We are delighted to share the following accommodation offer with you:
QuestionOnly_Intro: We're happy to answer your question. Please find our answer below:
QuestionOnly_MultiIntro: We're happy to answer your questions. Please find our answers below:
Multi_BodyText: We are delighted to share the following accommodation offers with you.
MultiofferIntro: For detailed information on your offer please scroll down:
HintHeadline: Click on the button to secure the price
HintText: Please be advised that until you finish the booking process the quoted rooms and rates are not guaranteed. Finish the booking process before price and availability changes.
Restaurant_BodyText: We're happy to let you know that we have table available at your requested time. To give you more options you can see the further available times.
AlternativeRestaurant_BodyText: We regret to inform you that we do not have any tables available at your requested time, however please see the closest times and restaurants available.
RestaurantIntro: These are the available times. Please book by clicking on the button and confirm via the website.
GroupofferIntro: We are pleased to send you our offer
Fully_IntroText:
Greetings from The Palace Hotel, Madrid, a living legend since 1912.
Thank you for considering our hotel for your upcoming stay.
Fully_ResBotText: I'm HERA, your digital XXX reservation assistant. I'm the latest addition to the Hotels family. I was created to send you offers really fast. But I am a bot and still learning, I hope you understand.
Fully_Ending: If you have any other questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Fully_UnsubscribeSentence: If you never want to get a automatic request again, please click here.
DataprotectionBox: You can book by clicking on the button. You will be forwarded to our website where your data is transmitted securely.
